rules_text:
Convoke
Th'Grud, Primordial King enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast it.
Non-Human creatures you control have trample.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from Th'Grud, Primordial King: Put a +1/+1 counter on each other non-Human creature you control.
